column4: Use autocomplete to select the scientific disciplines to which the dataset is relevant.
Use autocomplete to add the dataset to the collection of all datasets from a certain organisation.
Enter the details of a related dataset or other source

Specify the type of relation between the current dataset and the related source. See https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/rdf-relation-types/, use 'Relation' if the relation type cannot be described with any of the other available qualifiers.
Enter the title of the related dataset or other source
Enter the hyperlink of the related dataset or other source. Use a Persistent Identifier when possible.
